Equipment Shop
Tiers
Equipment
Unlock Level:
Cost:
Tier 1
Tier 2
Tier 3
A Laser Grid Pen that is similar to a flashlight. You can walk around the location and scan quickly for evidence, the only downside being its short range and low light intensity.

This is the original D.O.T.S. projector. It is a placeable projector emitting an average\-sized sphere of light, except now you can encourage the ghost to walk into it by standing nearby.

Best for small\-to\-medium sized rooms.

This placeable projector scans the room at a much longer range with a wide, sweeping beam of light, making finding ghosts in those bigger rooms much easier. For the best coverage, place this projector on a wall or flat surface, stand nearby, and watch for ghost silhouettes.
An old, analog Meter with a small detection range, low accuracy, and low audio emissions. The needle will go into overdrive, pushing past level 5 when level 5 EMF is detected.

The trusted K2 Meter has a larger range and five LED lights to detect EMF readings, as well as an additional speaker module. One light will turn on when you activate the device. When moving within the K2\'s detection range of EMF spots, it will display an accurate value from two to five and make a clear, audible sound.

A high\-tech ParaReader. This device can track up to three EMF spots at once and has a furthest detection range.

It\'ll show the direction, range, and value of each reading at the same time. It plays sounds for each EMF detection so you can hear, from a distance, how many and how strong the readings are.

If an EMF spot fades away, a more recent EMF spot will be placed at the bottom of the list.

The classic UV Flashlight which emits a brighter, narrow beam with a longer range, boasting a much faster UV charge time!

This device will charge up a UV spot within 5 seconds of exposure.

The classic UV glowstick. After snapping it to turn it on, it projects a short\-range area light that lasts around one minute before dimming. You can always give it another shake to reinvigorate its light.

This device will charge up a UV spot within 10 seconds of exposure.

The UV Light Pro is a chunky flashlight that has a much brighter and wider cone of light, as well as an even quicker charge time. It is perfect for locating Ultraviolet Evidence quickly on a larger scale.

This device will charge up a UV spot within 1.5 seconds of exposure.

An old house\-Thermometer, ripped straight off of your Investigator\'s living room wall. This Thermometer has a slow sample rate, meaning you\'ll have to wait longer to get an accurate reading. You may want to bring one in and check back on it later in the contract.

An updated version of the classic temperature reader, but much more responsive. Instead of turning it on and getting a reading every two seconds, hold the \'Use\' button to scan for temperatures. This makes running around and checking each room\'s temperatures much faster than Tier I allows for.

A straight upgrade to Tier II, completing temperature scans at double the speed of its predecessor. Additionally, this more modern Thermometer is more accurate with each reading, allowing players to quickly and efficiently scan rooms to find the ghost or to get \"Freezing Temperatures\" ticked off in the Journal.

<a>This paper notepad can be placed nearby a ghost to encourage some paranormal writing. Make sure to place it nearby any actvity you see. Some ghosts may not notice the small notepad and pencil, so it may take some time before anything happens.<p/>
With nicer pages and a pen, ghosts seem to notice this book a bit more often than the previous version. making wait times a bit shorter for evidence to occur.

With its large profile, a mixture of high-quality materials and an ornate pen, this book has the highest change to be written in by ghosts. It has a larger range than the previous two tiers so placing this book within a ghost\'s interaction range is much easier.

An old camcorder that Ghost Huntin\' Distribution found in the attic of the old office. It\'s small and a bit beaten up, but it does the job just fine.

Analyzing the video feed is a challenge due to its screen\'s awful quality and small dimensions, so take your time with it!
The Parasonic video camera is an HD video that makes finding orbs so much easier. It still gets a lot of interference from an active ghost, but much less so than Tier 1.
Bony\'s very own movie\-grade video camera with a large body supports a much larger screen. It features a much clearer video feed and gets less interference from ghost apparitions.

When turning this Spirit Box on, it will begin to scan through different radio frequencies. Make sure to stand near to any paranormal activity, turn off any lights in that room, and ask some questions in the hope of a response.

If the question has been heard, a red light will flash on the Spirit Box. If it flashes white, you\'ve got a response from the ghost.

Try asking "Where are you?" or "Are you friendly?". Be warned, you may not like the answer you receive.

This more modern Spirit Box has a higher-quality speaker which is much more efficient at scanning through frequencies, making paranormal responses easier to decipher.

If a question has been heard, a black \'X\' will flash on the screen. If you get a response, the small ghost icon will flash instead.

When turned on, this Spirit Box scans both frequencies, two at the same time, increasing the chance of picking up a paranormal response when asking questions. It also has a built-in filter to reduce the amount of static you hear between interactions.

If a question is heard an no response is given, the RESPONSE LEDs will flash red. If a reply is given, the LEDs will flash white in time with the sound.
A retro metallic flashlight, which provides a small amount of light. just enough to get around.
This flashlight emits a much brighter beam of light.
Projecting a much wider cone of light, this flashlight is perfect for large rooms and open spaces.

You can use this camera to take photos of any evidence you may find. It will only interfere with the ghost during the photo-taking process, so be careful when you decide to snap a picture.

For more information on how to take photos check the \'Photos\' section in your Journal.
With this digital photo camera, you can snap pictures of evidence and paranormal entities much faster than the previous Tier.

This top-of-the-range camera provides the lowest delay time between photos, allowing quick evidence gathering.

Additionally, it\'s been modified to be less susceptible to paranormal entities causing interference with the screen during manifestations.

These matches are perfect for lighting Firelights and Incense, but remember, with only ten uses you\'ll run out fast!

They can also be used as a small light source, just make sure not to burn your fingers.

A gas lighter. It provides a little more light than matches and lasts a lot longer.

You can see the liquid inside it drain as you use it, make sure you have enough left when you\'re in a pinch!

This Lighter could last you for an entire contract, as long as you\'re not wasting it!

With a larger flame, the light it provides is brighter and has a larger range, perfect for those dark getaways during an attack.
This small candle will provide light and some sanity loss prevention, but only for a while, the wax burns down quite fast!

With three candles instead of one, the light provided is much brighter, longer range, and lasts longer.

Additionally, this Firelight doesn\'t need to be held to gain its effects, so you can place it and stand nearby to still receive the sanity benefits!

This lantern will last for the entirety of a contract, so there\'s no worry about it going out when you need it most. Just like its predecessor, you can stand nearby to gain its effects.

Lastly, it\'s waterproof so it even works in the rain!

This crucifix can be held or placed to stop the ghost from initiating a single attack.

Make sure to keep it placed near any activity you may find.

A metal crucifix that can be used to block two attacks, with a larger range.

Remember to keep it near any activity you come across.
This crucifix has an even larger range than its previous version. Additionally, an unused crucifix can prevent a cursed hunt, consuming both uses.

While holding this container, you can place piles of Salt on the floor in the hope of tracking the ghost. We recommend placing them in doorways and near turns in hallways or rooms for the highest chance of getting a reaction.
This larger container holds more salt than its predecessor, allowing you to place long lines of salt to easily block wider passages.

This salt is so powerful it can affect a ghost\'s mobility in two ways.

Whilst a ghost is acting passively, these lines will act like a barrier, forcing the ghost to turn around when walking into one. Great for trapping those roaming ghosts in a room so you can find your evidence.

If it\'s during an attack, the ghost will be slowed, giving you extra time to make your escape.
You can light Incense with any Igniter to stop a ghost from initiating a hunt for a long duration, additionally, you can use it during a hunt when near a ghost to disorient it for a few seconds.

Much more sage has been used to create this incense bundle, allowing for a longer burn time, keeping you safer for longer during attacks.

Additionally, it will slow the movement of the ghost for part of its effect duration.

With a much larger range and longer burn time, you can ward off ghosts much more safely when attacked. When the ghost is initially repelled it will be stunned, halting its movement for a short period.

Attach a Video Camera to this Tripod by placing it on top. You can then carry the Tripod and place it in locations that may not have a good surface for viewing paranormal activity.

Ghosts may interfere with your placed cameras and attempt to knock them over, make sure to reset them back up if they are pushed to the floor.
This Tripod has been upgraded with a rotational motor. While viewing the Video Camera\'s view from the truck, you can use the on-screen controls to rotate the tripod motor, giving you a new angle.
Like its previous versions, this Tripod is similar except much sturdier, those pesky ghosts should knock it over much less frequently.
Place this motion sensor on walls or the floor and it will flash any time something moves in front of it, even things you can\'t see.

With two different modes, a longer range, and a sound indicator, this sensor is perfect for paranormal tracking.

You can toggle the laser shape by Interacting with the sensor after it has been placed.
Place this Motion Sensing camera on the floor near any ghost activity you may find. When activated, it will turn and flash a bright light whenever a ghost enters or exits its detection range.

Use this Sound Recorder to find and record paranormal sounds during investigations Successful recordings will reward extra money at the end of a contract.

You can even listen back to the recorded sound in the Journal!
This Sound Recorder has been upgraded with higher accuracy, better range, and a modern interface, It should make tracking down those paranormal sounds easier to find!

While activated, this Sound Recorder provides additional information on paranormal sounds.

The added directional and range indicators make finding and recording paranormal efficient and satisfying!

Place these sound sensors down in locations where you want to track any audio interactions.

Once placed, return to the Truck, you can listen to the remote playback whilst checking the Sound Sensor screen to see if any of the Sensors receive any readings.
This sound sensor has been improved to feature three different size settings, togglable with a size button on the Sound Sensor screen in the truck.

The tripod has rotational joints on it, allowing you to Interact with it to change the shape of the Sound Sensor.

Each shape is represented by the directions that the microphones are facing:

Forward: Cone / Outward: Sides / Inward: Sphere

Drink this bottle of vintage snake oil to restore a portion of your sanity. It will take a few seconds to complete the restoration, and the amount restored will depend on the difficulty you are playing.
Taking these pills will restore your Sanity faster. You can take several pots to increase the amount of Sanity restored over its duration.
This Adrenaline Shot will restore your sanity much faster than the previous two versions, additionally, you will not lose any sprint stamina for the entire duration of its effects.
While using the Parabolic Microphone and attached headphones, you will be able to hear sounds further away than normal, depending on which way you are aiming the microphone.

We\'ve improved this Parabolic Microphone with a couple of upgrades: a better sensor and a small screen.

Turning it on will allow you to hear distant sounds, as well as get a visual reading of how loud that sound is.

This Parabolic Microphone has been improved with a visual sound indicator.

Each time a sound is detected within the microphone\'s range, a visual indicator will be shown on the screen, including distance and volume, allowing you to easily track where the sound is coming from.
Strapping this small camera to your head allows your teammates to watch a live video feed of your view from the safety of the truck, great for multitasking and catching things that you may miss!

A small head-mounted flashlight that doesn\'t take up an inventory slot. The only downside is that the light isn\'t overly bright or wide.

You can toggle it on and off by holding your Special key bind.

A pair of Night Vision goggles, allowing you to see in the dark without the need for a flashlight.

Be warned though, your vision may get distorted if within range of an active ghost, rendering the goggles useless.
A small laser pen that projects small beams of light into the environment.
This infrared motion sensor was adapted heavily to project light. It\'s small and compact and can stick to most surfaces.
A motorized projector with three lenses for a wide coverage of light.
An EMF Meter with several modes for checking different interferences in the air. Sadly, it\'s old and only one of them works, luckily, it\'s the one we need for paranormal readings!
The trusty K2 has been used by paranormal investigators all over the world with consistent results.
A custom-made device from Ghost Huntin\' Distribution. Capable of much more than just displaying EMF values on its large screen.
Passed down through generations, we\'re surprised it\'s still working.
It\'s compact and lightweight, featuring a back button for a more tactical grip.
A much larger flashlight, it even has a carry handle!
An old Polteroid camera, a bit dusty and scratched. You\'ll have to wait for the photo to print before taking another one.
The Bony GhostShot is a compact, easy-to-use digital camera perfect for those panicked ghost photos in the dark.
One of Bony\'s best SLR cameras, complete with a wider lens, higher image quality, and quick processing power.
Ghost Huntin\' Distribution\'s very own matchbox, complete with a spooky little ghost as the mascot. Adorable!
A DiK lighter; Small, compact, and handy!
Since releasing, Zippy Lighters have been a staple for the military, and now,\' Ghost Investigators.
An old, rusting candle holder supporting a small candle, hopefully, it will last long enough if there\'s no other light. Don\'t forget something to light it with!
Candelabra with three tall candles attached. The ornate metal and higher-quality candle wax make for a much more reliable sanity saver!
It may look old, but this gasoline-fueled lantern is the most reliable firelight we\'ve found, it can last for hours on end.
A tactical small UV flashlight with a handy belt clip.
A small glow stick filled with a clear, oily liquid, mixed with fluorescent dye. Snapping the stick causes a reaction to illuminate the surrounding area with a bright color.
The UV Light Pro flashlight features nearly 80 individual bulbs, illuminating massive areas with light.
Just two scraps of wood tied together. The shape alone seems to be enough to ward off some paranormal entities.
Upgraded from wood to cast iron, this cross provides a much more reliable defense.
This ornate crucifix has been adorned with gold and silver linings. These intricate designs have been proven to increase defense against otherworldly beings.
We found a bunch of these old camcorders in a box in the old office, hopefully, they do the job well enough.
Parasonic released this video camera in hopes of replacing every Bony camcorder, it seems to have worked, mostly.
Bony is back with a state-of-the-art camera, modified solely for ghost hunters. It would also make for a great movie camera.
An old FM/AM radio. It\'s small and compact, but the speaker isn\'t the best quality.
The P-SB7T Spirit Box is built solely for conversations with the unknown. The backlit screen helps investigations in the dark.
The SB11-Z is a much larger Spirit Box, capable of scanning two frequency channels at the same time.
A vintage wall thermometer, normally used to measure room temperatures all year round by hanging it on a wall. It works perfectly fine when carrying it around too!

Normally used by medical professionals for quick temperature readings, this Infrared Thermometer is great for quick readings in a pinch. It does seem to give slightly inaccurate readings, though maybe it\'s just old.
More modern, more technical, and more accurate. You just can\'t beat it.
Ghost Huntin\' Distribution\'s very own brand of Salt probably doesn\'t taste the best, but it\'s great for ghosts.
We\'ve found that finely ground pink Himalayan salt is great for revealing those pesky footprints.
A glass bottle of blessed black salt, it\'s been combined with other minerals for extra cleansing effects. It looks prettier too, sparkly!
A small bundle of black sage, it seems like almost all of the leaves have fallen off, hopefully, it still works.
Large bundle of white sage, tied neatly with string for a compact and efficient burn when lit. It has a sweet bitter aroma.
A holy incense burner filled with a custom mixture designed specifically to ward off paranormal entities. Swinging this when lit will emit a large quantity of deterring smoke.
Cheap and cheerful, it\'s just about standing on its own. Better watch it doesn\'t fall over.
It\'s much more modern, clean, and sturdy. It\'s even got an electronic motor attached!
Reinforced metal legs with extendable legs, perfect for carrying around larger profile cameras.
Previously a wildlife camera, the sensor has been modified to track paranormal entities moving in front of it.
From what we learned by modifying the previous version, we\'ve managed to improve a more advanced camera for our paranormal tracking needs.
A security camera that was stripped apart and rebuilt from the ground up, granting it vision into the paranormal realm.
Old, banged up and taped together. This old Paracord Sound Recorder has scen much better days, thankfully it still worksâ€¦

Ghost Huntin\' Distribution\'s very own brand of Sound Recorder. It\'s more efficient than it\'s predecessor, the digital screen and new interface makes for an easier time hunting those spooky sounds.

BONY\'s latest in Sound Recording hardware. This device is equipped with several features to make hunting sounds as easy as can be. The dual microphone setup makes for much easier tracking, and quick recordings, even those that are barely audible.
A small microphone attached to a mini tripod, cheap and efficient.
Two higher-quality microphones are attached together on a custom-made tripod mount. They\'ve spent some extra time and money creating this one.
Expensive shotgun microphones are attached to a small receiver, avowing high-quality audio streams back to the Truck.
We are not sure how safe this Insane Away formula is, but it seems to help during those panicked ghost-hunting sessions.
Much more regulated and mass-produced product. Ghost Huntin\' Distribution must have hired some experts for this one.
A new formula created by specialists around the world, neatly contained in a small injection.
It may not be the most glamorous thing in the world, but it gets the job done.
The parchment pages are protected by a leather case. Keep your secrets extra safe by tying the rope on the outside.
A grimoire that seems to have a lot of history. The metallic accents make this heavy book much more elegant.
The 8X21, parabolic microphone, can amplify sounds much further than the naked ear can hear.
Upgraded and improved, this parabolic microphone is perfect for listening in on those paranormal conversations!
A high-quality microphone accompanied by a screen with a custom-made interface.
A GhostPro camera mounted to a set of head straps, not the most fashionable, but it\'s useful.
The straps are stronger, and the camera has been replaced with a small LED flashlight
Used by the military, these goggles allow you to see things the naked eye can\'t.
